law.catch_line: A person may not sell or offer for sale any speleothems in this State, or to export them for sale ou...
law.text: A person may not sell or offer for sale any speleothems in this State, or to export them for sale outside the State. A person who violates any of the provisions of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor, and, upon conviction, shall be fined not more than $500 and in addition may be imprisoned for not less than ten days nor more than six months.
